Hi there!

This is the very first blog post I am writing on this site!

It's formatted really awkwardly since I don't really know how to code HTML, but as soon as I get the brainpower and skills to make a better blog system I will move all of these posts to an easier posting/navigation system for my writing and your reading pleasure.

For now though, I will write like this, and try and document my journey through the internet, the film industry, and the world!

Thank you all,

Zoe <3
